title: Lab to determine the rotational inertia of pulley

Will the magnitude of the instantaneous acceleration of the blocks at the moment shown in the figure above be greater than, less than, or equal to the magnitude of the instantaneous acceleration when the axle was located at the center of the pulley? Assume that the blocks always start moving when released. Assume that the string never slips on the pulley.
